Q: Hi, my name is Mrs.Farhana i am 30 having 67kg wieght. My last date was 1st January,2012 I am using (Dirogest 10mg) Once a day as per my Doctor s advice .. i need to know that how long i have to take this medicine is there any side effects..? and also please let me know that this medicine be helpfull for me getting pregnant. looking forward for a positive come back ..
A: Hi, Generally it is well tolerated. Digest is a synthetic form of female hormone progesterone that is commonly prescribed for delayed period, irregular or heavy menstrual bleeding, endometriosis and other conditions. By regularizing your cycle it will help in getting you pregnancy. To regularize the period it is usually given from cycle days 5 to 25. Its common side effects include nausea, vomiting, headache, and breast pain/tenderness. Hope I have answered your question. Let me know if I can assist you further.
